results.deck: Ascaron is a game developer in Germany known primarily for the Sacred franchise.
results.description:
Insolvency Protection

On April 14, 2009, shortly after Sacred 2 went gold, Ascaron filed for insolvency protection with the German government. Their press release cited "extended development delay" for Sacred 2 as the cause, and stated that this would be used as a way to improve the company and look for a possible buyer. Support for Sacred 2, including multiplayer, would not be affected.
 

Ascaron Closes

Ascaraon official closed its doors in summer 2009, selling many of its assets to Kalypso Media. A handful of developers stayed on to complete the last of the Sacred 2: Ice And Blood expansion for German PC users.
results.name: ASCARON Entertainment GmbH

game.name: Port Royale: Gold, Power and Pirates
Tortuga: Pirates of the New World
